duties_responsibilities.duty: Weld and fabricate massive steel structures like large steel girders, beams, and nodes for skyscrapers and large power generation equipment.
Perform 3 position welding test/plate welding as per industry standards.
Use .045" 70 Series flux cored wire for welding.
Ensure compliance with safety standards and regulations.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma / GEDNCCER and OSHA 10 preferred
